actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A bill to prohibit arrangements by which public television VHF stations are converted, by exchange or otherwise, to commercial broadcasting stations.

summary.text: Public Television Anticonversion Act of 1985 - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that any very high frequency channel assigned for, and used by, a noncommercial educational broadcast station, as of May 1, 1985, may be assigned only for use by such a station after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit arrangements by which public television VHF stations are converted, by exchange or otherwise, to commercial broadcasting stations.
